greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Irregular triangle 3^n-2^m.
comment: Each n-th row consists of A056576(n) terms, the first term is 3^n-2, n-th term is 3^n-2^n=A001047(n), and the last term is A056577(n).
T(n,k) = A227048(n,A056576(n)-k) for k = 1..A056576(n). - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jun 30 2013
link: T. D. Noe, Rows n = 1..100 of triangle, flattened
results.author: _Zak Seidov_, Oct 03 2011
